item.description:
Note earlier start time (noon, rather than 1 p.m.)

Swap theme #1: Seeing red
Swap theme #2: Hand-drawn ATCs or ATCs with hand-drawn elements. (Check out the discussion for the October meetup for a description of techniques. Feel free to email Kate Robinson with any questions about this.)

DEMO: Name Tags Jam Session - join us for a favorite activity of this group! We'll do a jam-style session to create backgrounds for ATCs, one of which will become a background for a name tag. If you're NEW to the group, help us learn your name and we will wear our tags to help you learn all of ours. If you're a long-term member, freshen up your name tag with a new background card for it. We'll use jam remainders to leave name tags for future new members and to provide a new name tag background for anyone who cannot attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Use door off parking lot (near back of building)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ November Meetup in Natick: Saturday, 11/17
